price: A da im Allah nije već bio propisao izgnanstvo, On bi ih drugoj patnji još na ovome svijetu podvrgao! A njima na onome svijetu pripada patnja u Vatri.
arabic: وَلَوۡلَآ أَن كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡجَلَآءَ لَعَذَّبَهُمۡ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَلَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ عَذَابُ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walawlā an kataba al-lahu ʿalayhimu al-jalāa laʿadhabahum fī al-dun'yā walahum fī al-ākhirati ʿadhābu al-nāri
